parsing_warnings: Seller postal address and seller tax ID not found on the invoice.
No explicit payment terms label (e.g., 'Net 30') present.
No per-line taxes or shipping fees shown; taxes and shipping assumed absent.
checks: Sum of line item amounts = 99.00 + 191.00 + 471.50 = 761.50 (matches Subtotal $761.50).
Discount $76.15 equals 10% of subtotal $761.50 (as noted 'Multi-service discount (10%)').
Grand total $685.35 = Subtotal $761.50 - Discounts $76.15 (matches displayed Total).
Paid amount $685.35 equals Grand total and Due is $0.00 (invoice marked PAID).
